column5: Anyone have any reports here? Bow Narrows guests? Black bear lodge was closed last I heard. Curious if there's any reports coming out of red lake? Specifically the west end. Much appreciated!!
Black Bear is closed for this year as my buddy is neighbors with the owner’s brother
LoDo we go to Bow Narrows every year. This year we will be there the last week of July. When are you going? If it before we do and you have any reports I would really like to hear them. Charlie
Neighbor in west red lake says it's slow. Pike fishing as good as it gets. Several 40 plus. Walleyes are off the bite in normal areas. That's all I got.
My son works at the gold mine and brought his boat up there for his 2 week shift and fished by Balmertown and said fishing was very good.
